website_summaries.verdict: Consider this kit if you want a fairly comprehensive option that's compact enough to keep in your car or store in tight spaces.
pros: Although on the compact side, this kit is packed with essentials including first aid items, food and water
Owners say that the size is perfect for stowing it in a vehicle
Available at a decent price point
cons: The backpack doesn't have much extra space to add items, plus the material it's made of is on the flimsy side
Kits have been reported to have pieces missing upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Great Survival Kit
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend this product! I like it and it has everything I would need in a disaster situation. It's in the back of our car--and it's small and lightweight, which is perfect, yet has everything we would need.
customer_reviews.author: MedievalHistorian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap backpack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is small and sub standard. The first time I used the zipper it broke. I bought this for my car and didn’t look at all the contents. I hope better quality than the cheap backpack.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Compact and complete
customer_reviews.text: We live on the Gulf Coast, so it's great to have a bag with supplies for me and my husband for two days all ready to grab and go if a hurricane comes our way. It's great that it is so compact while being thorough. I examined each item in the pack and am confident that everything will be easy to use, even under duress. The only issue I foresee is I might have trouble repacking it! Having this pack on hand provides peace of mind knowing it helps us prepare for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: LyndsyJo

customer_reviews.title: An overpriced OK Bug Out Bag. Review from an Emergency Manager.
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Very expensive for what you get. No they are NOT N95 masks like I originally bought for. It's a nice little bug out bag for one person but I feel one could do a much better job with less money. You are paying for the convenience. I only bought one because of the some of the reviews earlier said N95 masks as well as how they advertised this. All in all, it's OK if you really don't want to take the time to get these things together for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Irishsnakeman

customer_reviews.title: Not as described. No N95 mask.
customer_reviews.text: Product description clearly indicated N95 mask were included at time of purchase. Description has since been changed and when the product arrived it did not include any N95 mask. Have requested a refund will update with results. Update: Seller ignored my refund request and Amazon ended up crediting me back the cost of the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Cleary

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Camping accessory
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is now the very first thing I pack when we head out camping. it is small and compact, but has everything you need in case of an emergency. I may now get one for each of my cars. It is a great items and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn O.

customer_reviews.title: Contents  of First Aid Kit
customer_reviews.text: The first order contained water packets of which one of them had burst inside the box before it was opened. I notified Amazon, who in turn notified the seller. The seller e-mailed me and asked me to check & see if the flashlight worked. I responded that it did work. To this date no arrangements have been made to replace the bag. All of the contents inside were affected. I had no problem with the second order. Thank You, Matilda Harris
customer_reviews.author: TillieJayne

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed an emergency kit. This fit the job. Small and light. Bag is small no room to put extra clothiers in it. But great survival bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ayisha Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Products
customer_reviews.text: The bag itself is not reliable, however the products are what you need to make a Go-Bag, in which case was my intention. I disliked the fact that the bag had a company card inside for a reminder, I sent it and days later got it back as the address was not valid. Overall, if you’re building a go-bag, you’re in the right place!
customer_reviews.author: Jossue Salome Reyes

customer_reviews.title: A pretty good selection of survival related items all in one package.
customer_reviews.text: Supplement with some protein bars and your favorite flashlight and you're in business. I plan on using several of these in our vehicles to give us a hand in case of another emergency like Hurricane Michael last year.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit arrived in perfect condition and contained everything it promised it would. I couldn't be happier with it. I was concerned that in this time of Covid-19 I would not receive the items as stated but I did. I'd recommend this kit by this manufacturer to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary H.

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to stay safe.
customer_reviews.text: If your going to go out on a hike or just want something that has all the essential emergency products then this is the perfect item for you.
customer_reviews.author: M R

customer_reviews.title: good to have around in general
customer_reviews.text: We live in a area that gets alot of possibly for tornadoes and icy conditions so this is going to be good for if our power is off for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Gives me peace of mind knowing I have this on hand in case of an emergency.
customer_reviews.author: linkcorb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Small, compact, and filled with so much. Have one for the house and will purchase another for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Garner

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Nice, small bag packed with all the basic essentials! I’m so happy I bought this considering the recent quakes in CA.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: The bookbag is really small but has all the supplies that are in the picture. I believe the bookbag was purposely made small so that it's easy to grab and go. Overall the bookbag is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: FIRST AID
customer_reviews.text: I AM WRITING TO LET YOU KNOW THAT MY ORDER RESCUE GUARD SURVIVAL PACK I AM MISSING THE FIRST AID KIT. IF YOU COULD SEND IT TO ME.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Watson

customer_reviews.title: EP Kit
customer_reviews.text: Don't really know what I was expecting, but I will have to use as an addition to a larger backpack for emergency preparedness
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest quality but ok for emergency
customer_reviews.text: I thought backpack would be bigger and quality of product was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little emergency kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this emergency kit for my daughter who is headed off to college in another state. I have to say that I am impressed. First, it is a very small backpack but has all the basics plus a little room. I love how small and compact it is, plus it has enough supplies for both her and her roommate. I will supplement it with identification, some money, a pocket knife, waterproof pen and paper, leather gloves, water purification tablets, and probably a few other small items. I am an emergency management volunteer and do search and rescue and feel this is a great little beginning emergency kit for my college bound daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Cook'in Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for Covid and more
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this because we live in an earthquake prone area in California. Thankfully we have not had to use for that but this thing turned out be great for covid-19. It has N95 masks, gloves, sterile wipes, bottled water and more. I was fortunate to be able to buy 5 more from Amazon before they sold out and send them to the rest of my family who are also dealing with the coronavirus
customer_reviews.author: Grateful1

customer_reviews.title: Never ordering again!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with quality of product, so I returned it for a refund. I only received a 75% refund of the total price I paid, AND I had to pay for shipping to return it which cost me $32 since the item was so heavy! I will NEVER buy any of Rescue Guards items, as they do not handle returns very well or fair at al!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: GUYS BEWARE THIS PRODUCT DOESNT SHIP FROM THE ACTUAL BRAND NIRISTHE PRODUCT RELIABLE,,,,, bad bad bad do not purchase- there are far better brands.
customer_reviews.author: jjbc

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, but not for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool little kit, but the price is pretty crazy for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: michael weyenberg

customer_reviews.title: Survival Shelter Video?
customer_reviews.text: How To videos on how to set up the survival shelter?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rescue Guard First Aid Kit Hurricane Disaster or Earthquake Emergency Survival Bug Out Bag Supplies for Families - 72 Hours of Disaster Preparedness Supplies
feature_bullets: SURVIVAL BACKPACK; 72 Hour, Bug Out Backpack, Emergency Kit Backpack, Earthquake Kit for 4; More Emergency Supplies than Other Earthquake Kits
Survival Kit! Bug Out Bag! Earthquake Survival Kit; Earthquake Kit! Emergency Supplies, Bug Out Bags, Survival Gear! Camping Gear, Hiking Gear

Basic Expert Emergency Survival Kit; LEVEL ONE; Emergency Kit or Basic Survival Kit Includes 6 Days of Emergency Supplies and Emergency Food for One Person, or 72 Hours of Survival Gear for Two People; Emergency Kit for Small Family; This SURVIVAL BAG is Not for Medium to Large Family and Will NOT Cover; Other Emergency Kits We Make Have More Emergency Supplies

SURVIVAL PACK or EARTHQUAKE SURVIVAL KIT Has HIGHEST-QUALITY ITEMS of ALL SURVIVAL KITS - Premium Items Included: Water, Food, Tent, Ponchos, Rope, Light, First Aid Kit, Survival Compass, Fire Starter and Thermal Blankets; a Full Survival Backpack to Weather Any Storm; BEST in SURVIVAL BACKPACKS

PREMIUM EMERGENCY GO BAG: This Bug Out Bag Contains Supplies For Four People To Survive A Natural Disaster for 72 Hours. BUG OUT BAGS are Essential; Stay Prepared And Ready , Keep Your Family Safe with this EMERGENCY Backpack

FIRST AID KIT : After An Natural Disaster Health Care Providers May Not Be Able To Reach You For Some Time. A Variety Of Bandages Pain Relievers Ointment Gauze & Tape Sanitary Gloves And A First Aid Guide. If You Camp In The Mountain Or Your House, Stay Fully Prepping For Storm Season With The Right Necessities; Level I Only Has Our Travel First Aid Kit

BE COMFORTABLY PREPARED: Kids Feel Safe With Light, Our Squeeze Power Flashlight Generates Power And Stored For Use To Keep The Led Bulbs Bright. If Forced Into Camping Be A Survivor With Our Mre's Meals Supply. of Emergency Food Rations & Emergency Water; Best In Earthquake Kits and Earthquake Bags!
